Ceres-Solver
============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Ceres-Solver installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Ceres-Solver, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Ceres-Solver/2.2.0-foss-2022b
```
